@summary.text: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that reveal or hide associated sections of content.

customElement.name: Accordion
customElement.summary: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that reveal or hide associated sections of content.

@summary.text: The Avatar component is used to represent user, and displays the profile picture, initials or fallback icon.

@summary.text: Buttons help people initiate actions, from sending an email, to sharing a document, to liking a post.

@overview.text: Buttons are clickable elements that are used to trigger actions. They communicate calls to action to the user and allow users to interact with pages in a variety of ways. Button labels express what action will occur when the user interacts with it.

@cssprop.text: --neo-button-label-text-color: Text color of the neo button label.

@fires.text: button:click - Dispatched when the button is clicked.

customElement.name: Button

cssProperties.description: Defines the border radius of the button container shape.
cssProperties.name: --button-container-shape:

cssProperties.description: Defines the start position of the button container shape.
cssProperties.name: --button-container-shape-start-start:

cssProperties.description: Defines the end position of the button container shape.
cssProperties.name: --button-container-shape-start-end:

cssProperties.description: Defines the start position of the button container shape.
cssProperties.name: --button-container-shape-end-start:

cssProperties.description: Defines the end position of the button container shape.
cssProperties.name: --button-container-shape-end-end:

cssProperties.description: Color of the filled button container.
cssProperties.name: --filled-button-container-color:

cssProperties.description: Text color of the filled button label.
cssProperties.name: --filled-button-label-text-color:

cssProperties.description: Color of the outlined button container.
cssProperties.name: --outlined-button-container-color:

cssProperties.description: Text color of the outlined button label.
cssProperties.name: --outlined-button-label-text-color:

cssProperties.description: Text color of the text button label.
cssProperties.name: --text-button-label-text-color:

cssProperties.description: Color of the tonal button container.
cssProperties.name: --tonal-button-container-color:

cssProperties.description: Text color of the tonal button label.
cssProperties.name: --tonal-button-label-text-color:

cssProperties.description: Color of the elevated button container.
cssProperties.name: --elevated-button-container-color:

cssProperties.description: Text color of the elevated button label.
cssProperties.name: --elevated-button-label-text-color:

cssProperties.description: Color of the neo button container.
cssProperties.name: --neo-button-container-color:

cssProperties.description: Text color of the neo button label.
cssProperties.name: --neo-button-label-text-color:

members.name: iconAlign
members.description:
Icon alignment.
Possible values are `"start"`, `"end"`. Defaults to `"end"`.

members.name: type
members.description: Type is preset of color and variant. Type will be only applied.

members.name: variant
members.description:
The visual style of the button.

 Possible variant values:
`"filled"` is a filled button.
`"outlined"` is an outlined button.
`"text"` is a transparent button.
`"tonal"` is a light color button.
`"elevated"` is elevated button

members.name: color
members.description: Defines the primary color of the button. This can be set to predefined color names to apply specific color themes.

members.name: size
members.description:
Button size.
Possible values are `"sm"`, `"md"`, `"lg"`. Defaults to `"md"`.

members.name: disabled
members.description: If true, the user cannot interact with the button. Defaults to `false`.

members.name: softDisabled
members.description: If true, the user cannot interact with the button and the button is visually styled as disabled. But the button is still focusable. Defaults to `false`.

members.name: disabledReason
members.description: If button is disabled, the reason why it is disabled.

members.name: href
members.description: Hyperlink to navigate to on click.

members.name: target
members.description: Sets or retrieves the window or frame at which to target content.

members.name: throttleDelay
members.description: Sets the delay for throttle in milliseconds. Defaults to 200 milliseconds.

members.name: isPressed
members.description: States

events.description: Dispatched when the button is clicked.
events.name: button:click

@summary.text: Displays the current time in a given timezone.

@overview.text:
- Clocks are used to display the current time in a specified timezone.
 - They can be displayed in various formats, including 12-hour and 24-hour time.

customElement.name: Clock
customElement.summary: Displays the current time in a given timezone.

@summary.text: The divider component is used to visually separate content.

@overview.text:
- Dividers are used to separate content into clear groups, making it easier for users to scan and understand the information presented.
 - They can be oriented either vertically or horizontally, depending on the layout requirements.

@cssprop.text: --divider-padding - Controls the padding of the divider.

customElement.name: Divider

cssProperties.description: Controls the color of the divider.
cssProperties.name: --divider-color

cssProperties.description: Controls the padding of the divider.
cssProperties.name: --divider-padding

customElement.summary: The divider component is used to visually separate content.

@overview.text:
- Elevation adds a shadow effect to an element to give it depth.
 - It can be used to create a sense of hierarchy or to draw attention to a particular element.

@cssprop.text: --elevation-color - Controls the color of the shadow.

@example.text:
```html
Level 2
```

cssProperties.description: Controls the elevation level of the shadow.
cssProperties.name: --elevation-level

cssProperties.description: Controls the color of the shadow.
cssProperties.name: --elevation-color

@summary.text: Adds a focus ring to an element.

customElement.name: FocusRing
customElement.summary: Adds a focus ring to an element.

@summary.text: Icons are visual symbols used to represent ideas, objects, or actions.

@overview.text: Icons are visual symbols used to represent ideas, objects, or actions. They communicate messages at a glance, afford interactivity, and draw attention to important information.

@cssprop.text: [--icon-size=1rem] - Controls the size of the icon. Defaults to "1rem"

customElement.name: Icon

cssProperties.description: Controls the color of the icon.
cssProperties.name: --icon-color

cssProperties.description: Controls the size of the icon. Defaults to "1rem"
cssProperties.name: --icon-size

members.name: name
members.description:
The identifier for the icon.
This name corresponds to a specific SVG asset in the icon set.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The identifier for the icon.
This name corresponds to a specific SVG asset in the icon set.

customElement.summary: Icons are visual symbols used to represent ideas, objects, or actions.

@summary.text: Icon buttons allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap.
